title: (No. 40 of 2011) including for the purposes of section 31(6) of that Act, and
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Property Services (Regulation)
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Property Services (Regulation) 

Act 2011 (Renewal of Certain Licences) Regulations 2023.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited property service (regulation) act 2011 (renewal certain licences) regulation 2023

title: (No. 40 of 2011) including for the purposes of section 31(6) of that Act, and
heading: In these Regulations –
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations – 

“Act of 2011” means the Property Services (Regulation) Act 2011 (No. 40 of 
2011); 

“licence” means a licence, within the meaning of the Act of 2011, that is stated 
therein to have an expiry date of 5 November 2023.
text_norm: 2 regulation - act 2011 mean property service (regulation) act 2011 (no 40 2011) licence mean licence within meaning act 2011 stated therein expiry date 5 november 2023

title: (No. 40 of 2011) including for the purposes of section 31(6) of that Act, and
heading: 3. These Regulations apply to the renewal of licences in accordance with
text_raw:
3. These Regulations apply to the renewal of licences in accordance with 
section 35 of the Act of 2011 pursuant to renewal applications duly made in the 
year 2023 only and references in these Regulations to the renewal of a licence 
or an application for the renewal of a licence shall be construed accordingly.
text_norm: 3 regulation apply renewal licence accordance section 35 act 2011 pursuant renewal application duly made year 2023 reference regulation renewal licence application renewal licence shall construed accordingly

title: (No. 40 of 2011) including for the purposes of section 31(6) of that Act, and
heading: 4. Subject to Regulations 3 and 5, where a licence (other than the licence
text_raw:
4. Subject to Regulations 3 and 5, where a licence (other than the licence 
of an individual) is being renewed in accordance with section 35 of the Act of 
2011 and the initial letter of the name of the licensee contained in the 
“Licensee Details” column of the Property Services Register as at 24 
September 2023 falls between the letters – 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

a to b, the period of validity of the licence so renewed shall be 
15 months, 

c to g, the period of validity of the licence so renewed shall be 
14 months, 

h to n, the period of validity of the licence so renewed shall be 
13 months, and 

(d) o to z, the period of validity of the licence so renewed shall be 

12 months, 

commencing on the date on which the licence was otherwise due to expire. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 29th September, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [475] 3

title: (No. 40 of 2011) including for the purposes of section 31(6) of that Act, and
heading: 5. For the purposes of Regulation 4, in ascertaining the initial letter of the
text_raw:
5. For the purposes of Regulation 4, in ascertaining the initial letter of the 
name of the licensee contained in the “Licensee Details” column of the 
Property Services Register as at 24 September 2023, titles such as “Dr.”, “Mr.” 
and “Ms.” shall be disregarded.
text_norm: 5 purpose regulation 4 ascertaining initial letter name licensee contained licensee detail column property service register 24 september 2023 title dr mr m shall disregarded

title: (No. 40 of 2011) including for the purposes of section 31(6) of that Act, and
heading: 6. Subject to Regulations 3 and 7, where the licence of an individual is
text_raw:
6. Subject to Regulations 3 and 7, where the licence of an individual is 
being renewed in accordance with section 35 of the Act of 2011 and the initial 
letter of the surname of the licensee contained in the “Licensee Details” 
column of the Property Services Register as at 24 September 2023 falls 
between the letters – 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

a to b, the period of validity of the licence so renewed shall be 
15 months, 

c to g, the period of validity of the licence so renewed shall be 
14 months, 

h to n, the period of validity of the licence so renewed shall be 
13 months, and 

(d) o to z, the period of validity of the licence so renewed shall be 

12 months, 

commencing on the date on which the licence was otherwise due to expire.
text_norm: 6 subject regulation 3 7 licence individual renewed accordance section 35 act 2011 initial letter surname licensee contained licensee detail column property service register 24 september 2023 fall letter - (a) (b) (c) b period validity licence renewed shall 15 month c g period validity licence renewed shall 14 month h n period validity licence renewed shall 13 month (d) z period validity licence renewed shall 12 month commencing date licence otherwise due expire

title: (No. 40 of 2011) including for the purposes of section 31(6) of that Act, and
heading: 7. For the purposes of Regulation 6, in the case of an application for
text_raw:
7. For the purposes of Regulation 6, in the case of an application for 
renewal of a licence made by a principal officer or an employee of a property 
services employer where the licence of the property services employer is stated 
therein to have an expiry date of 5 November 2023, the initial letter of the 
surname of the principal officer or employee shall be deemed to be the initial 
letter – 

(a) 

of the name of his or her property services employer, ascertained 
in accordance with Regulations 4 and 5, or 

(b) of the surname of his or her property services employer, 
ascertained in accordance with Regulation 6, where that 
employer is an individual. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [475] 

The Minister for Justice consents to the making of the foregoing Regulations. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Minister for Justice, 

26 September, 2023. 

HELEN MCENTEE, 
Minister for Justice. 

GIVEN under the Seal of the Property Services Regulatory 
Authority, 

26 September, 2023. 

MICHAEL QUINLAN, 

Chairperson, Property Services Regulatory Authority. 

MAEVE HOGAN, 

Chief Executive, Property Services Regulatory Authority. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [475] 5

title: (No. 40 of 2011) including for the purposes of section 31(6) of that Act, and
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations provide for the granting of licences of between twelve and 
fifteen months duration to licensees whose licences expire on 5 November,
text_norm: explanatory note (this note part instrument purport legal interpretation.) regulation provide granting licence twelve fifteen month duration licensee whose licence expire 5 november
